algorithm_technique: Sliding window to find the maximum additional satisfied customers during the grumpy period.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize satisfied customers by using a one-time technique to make the owner not grumpy for a consecutive duration.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate base satisfied customers, then use a sliding window to find the maximum extra customers satisfied by the technique.
key_insights: The problem can be decomposed into two parts: initially satisfied customers and extra satisfied customers using the technique.
A sliding window of size 'minutes' efficiently calculates the maximum gain from the technique.
The key is to track the sum of customers during grumpy periods within the window.
